Change.Value: Bug Fix: Previewing matches was deleting files from the output directory.
Added TIE Advanced at 84.5% pixel match.
Updated instructions with how to use the MatchLog.txt file when trying to figure out what Pixel Percent to use for units.
Bug Fix: Cultural PC settings were throwing off some values in Defaults.xml between using '.' and ',' in number formats.
Exposed Pri and Group for overwriting in Units.xml.
Ordered units by priority, then by name. This should eliminate differences between when unit data gets refreshed.
Added more graceful failures when pushing content to Google Sheets fails.
Added ErrorLog.txt to track errors encountered by the tool as it runs.
Closing the app will close all child windows.
New units on swgoh.gg should auto-download. This will not get unit changes like image or name changes.
Added Reset Defaults button to Settings Window.
Added Reset Defaults button to Unit Window.
Processing units will check if the UI and Spreadsheet phases match before proceeding.
